basic.title: Basic Dyslexia Screening
basic.description: A quick assessment to identify key indicators of dyslexia and reading difficulties.
basic.note: These assessments are screening tools only and not diagnostic instruments. Results should be discussed with a qualified educational specialist or healthcare professional.
basic.aboutDescription1: Dyslexia is a learning difference that primarily affects reading and related language-based processing skills. Early identification can lead to more effective support strategies.
basic.aboutDescription2: Our screening tests look at various indicators, including reading fluency, word recognition, phonological awareness, and processing speed to help identify potential signs of dyslexia.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Dyslexia Assessment
comprehensive.description: An in-depth evaluation covering all aspects of reading, writing, and processing abilities.
